nodes.text: Trellen was a planet at the junction of the Hydian Way and the Trellen Trade Route.

The area of space around Trellen was explored between 27,500 BBY and 25,000 BBY and it was within space controlled by the Galactic Republic by 22,000 BBY. It was controlled by the Galactic Empire until at least 8 ABY, but was a stronghold of the New Republic during the Thrawn campaign of 9 ABY. Trellen was attacked by forces of the warlord Treuten Teradoc in 10 ABY, just prior to the launching of Operation Shadow Hand.
